sentences.sContent: Money flowed into Rome and supported a growing bureaucracy and opulence, which ultimately led to the Reformation.
sentences.sContent_eng: Money flowed into Rome and supported a growing bureaucracy and opulence, which ultimately led to the Reformation.
sentences.sCn: 越来越多的钱流入罗马，并支持了官僚主义的富裕，最终导致了改革。

sentences.sContent: It's hard to say what you'll find most breathtaking about the eternal city - the arrogant opulence of the Vatican or the timelessness of the Forum.
sentences.sContent_eng: It's hard to say what you'll find most breathtaking about the eternal city - the arrogant opulence of the Vatican or the timelessness of the Forum.
sentences.sCn: 在这座永恒之城，很难有什么是最激动人心的发现 - 梵蒂冈傲慢的富裕或者是古罗马广场的永恒。
